statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
Tomorrow is contest day, Are you all ready?
We have been training for 45 days, and all guys must be tired.But , you are so lucky comparing with many excellent boys who have no chance to attend the Province-Final.

Now, your task is relaxing yourself and making the last practice. I guess that at least there are 2 problems which are easier than this problem.
what does this problem describe?
Give you a positive integer, please split it to some prime numbers, and you can got it through sample input and sample output.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Input file contains multiple test case, each case consists of a positive integer n(1<n<65536), one per line. a negative terminates the input, and it  should not to be processed.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case you should output its factor as sample output (prime factor must come forth ascending ), there is a blank line between outputs.

statement.title: Sample Output
statement.content:
Case 1.
2 2 3 1 5 1

Case 2.
2 2 3 1

Hint

60=2^2*3^1*5^1
